short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A debugging tool designed for developers and testers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The source code program can set variables to DebugMate through the SDK. During testing, variables can be manipulated to implement page-specific functionality.

Please refer to the detailed usage steps at: https://github.com/TaroXin/debug-mate
